definition: to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

pinyin: gu3 fen4 you3 xian4 gong1 si1

sentences.english: Such boys as we know are drillers.
sentences.chinese: 我们认识的这样一些小伙子都是司钻。

sentences.english: People usually lose weight quite quickly when they take orlistat.
sentences.chinese: 服用奥利司他胶囊，减肥迅速。

sentences.english: He is a driller whose opinions I like to air conditioningcept.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个我愿意接受其意见的司钻。

sentences.english: Devout men buried Stephen and made great lamentation over him.
sentences.chinese: 有虔诚的人把司提反埋葬了，为他捶胸大哭。

sentences.english: Raw materials, the Ministry of Industry, Deputy Secretary Song was recently revealed long beads.
sentences.chinese: 工信部原材料司副司长宋显珠近日透露。

sentences.english: When all personnel are ready, the driller engages the drawworks in forward drive and starts reeving in the new drilling line.
sentences.chinese: 人员都就位后，司钻启动绞车正转，开始缠新大绳。

sentences.english: Department planning department and industrial department attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 部规划司和产业司参加了会议。

sentences.english: Soft yee fu enter the palace, become a female officer.
sentences.chinese: 傅柔阴差阳错下进入皇宫，成为司织女官。

sentences.english: In general, I wouldn't worry about the effect of statins on memory.
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，我不会担心司他汀对记忆力的影响。

sentences.english: Our hard-working driller is someone you can believe in.
sentences.chinese: 我们勤奋的司钻是一个你可依赖的人。

sentences.english: If you want to win Tom's heart， make him a cheesecake.
sentences.chinese: 若是你想讨汤姆欢心，做起司蛋糕给他吃准没错。

sentences.english: In case of any problems encountered during enforcement, please feedback in timely to the Management Department of Current Accounts under the SAFE.
sentences.chinese: 执行中如遇问题请及时向总局经常项目管理司反馈。

sentences.english: Chili, pepper and shallot are usually necessaries in this division.
sentences.chinese: 辣椒，辣椒和葱，通常在这个司必需品。

sentences.english: Dr. Scholl's Air-Pille Insoles help take the place of that fatty tissue.
sentences.chinese: 司各尔博士气式鞋垫可以替代脚底的脂肪层。

sentences.english: The driller resumes normal drilling operations.
sentences.chinese: 司钻恢复正常钻井作业。

sentences.english: And he said, Amos, what seest thou?
sentences.chinese: 他说，阿摩司阿，你看见什么。

definition: barley/to moo/to seek or obtain/old variant of 侔[mou2]/old variant of 眸[mou2]
(arch.) minister/official/noun prefix denoting function or status/a youth
